Summary: long,thin, irregular outline. Flat area on the side toward the front
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving northbound on Cross Pointe blvd, Between SR62 (Morgan ave.) and Sr66 (Lloyd Expressway). The object didn't attract my attention at first, due to the location of the airport a few miles away. It was traveling south at an altitude of a few hundred feet... not unusual in the area. the speed was about that of a small plane. The thing that caught my attention was a flash of reflected light off a rather large flat area on the side of the nose. I was convinced that it was a small plane, but I thought "What sort of plane has that flat spot?". It was at that point that I noticed the lack of wings or horizontal tail surfaces. It was a rather indistinct shape... long and dark, with a "segmented" appearance (the outline was not smooth, but looked as though it was several parts married together into one vehicle). I did not see any evidence of a propeller, nor did I hear the sound of a jet. By the time I realized what I had (I've hoped to see a UFO since a sighting I had as a child) and had turned eastbound to get a better look, it was gone. I have lived near this airport for 51 years and am quite familiar with the aircraft that arrive and depart. I do not recognize this one. I am not making any claims of extraterrestrial origins, little gray guys or reptilians. I am just reporting an Unidentified Flying Object.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Evansville
